Articles.Content:
I am trying to make a part output electric charge when the throttle is between 0 and 0.25. For some reason, it's outputting 175 EC instead of 5. Here is my code:

Throttle = FlightInputHandler.state.mainThrottle;

if (Throttle < 0.25)

Power = Throttle * 5 - 5;

else

Power = 0;

this.part.RequestResource("ElectricCharge", Power);

Thanks
You're requesting -5 Ec per physics frame. Multiply it by Timewarp.fixedDeltaTime to make it per second
